# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2024-10-21

### Added
- Initial release of QINA Security Editor
- Real-time code monitoring and vulnerability scanning
- CloudDefense AI integration
- SARIF format support
- Git integration for branch scanning
- Beautiful terminal UI with color-coded output
- Command-line interface with `/help` commands
- Configuration management system
- Authentication service
- Findings management and storage
- JavaScript scan service wrapper
- Comprehensive error handling and logging

### Features
- 🔍 Real-time file monitoring
- 🛡️ Vulnerability scanning using CloudDefense AI
- 📊 Detailed security reports with severity classification
- 🔧 Git integration for branch scanning
- ⚡ Fast performance optimized for developers
- 🎨 Beautiful terminal interface
- 🔐 Secure credential management
- 📁 Configurable scan directories
- 🔄 Auto-update functionality
- 📈 Usage tracking and limits

### Security
- Environment variable based credential management
- No hardcoded API keys or secrets
- Secure configuration file handling
- Input validation and sanitization

### Technical Details
- Python 3.8+ support
- Async/await architecture
- WebSocket communication
- REST API integration
- Modular package structure
- PyPI distribution ready
